title: Meta-Plan: Things to Plan For
description: Items identified that lack a concrete plan yet.
items: 01- Plan for 'Topics to Learn' (schedule specific days/weeks per topic)
02- Plan for 'Russian Learning' (break down course lessons)
03- Plan for 'English Enhancement' (PTE test prep steps)
04- Plan for 'Decluttering Digital Life' (Telegram, Drive, Photos)
05- Plan for 'Laptop Upgrade/Repair' (Decision: Fix or Buy?)
07- Plan for 'Route Course' (50GB) - Determine when to start
